item.title: Gibbs Sampling Explained: The Wisdom of Divide and Conquer
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: When high-dimensional spaces are overwhelming, Gibbs sampling adopts a ‘divide and conquer’ strategy. By utilizing full conditional distributions, it breaks down complex N-dimensional joint sampling into N simple 1-dimensional sampling steps. This article explains its intuition, mathematical proof (Brook’s Lemma), and Python implementation.
